scripts.clean: rimraf docs/* && echo Purging old files...
scripts.preBuild: mkdirp docs/js docs/css docs/img && echo Creating directories...
scripts.buildModern: cross-env BABEL_ENV=modern babel src/js/hymns.js -o docs/js/hymns.min.js && echo Building ES6+ Files...
scripts.buildLegacy: cross-env BABEL_ENV=legacy babel src/js/hymns.js -o docs/js/hymns.legacy.min.js && echo Building ES5 Files...
scripts.build: echo Building Source Files... && npm run preBuild && npm run buildModern && npm run buildLegacy
